mapper.insert: insert into detailed_purchase (purchase_id, vendor_id, sku_id, batch, purchase_price, number, status, create_user_id, create_time) values (#{purchaseId}, #{vendorId}, #{skuId}, #{batch}, #{purchasePrice}, #{number}, 0, #{createUserId}, now());
mapper.update:
update detailed_purchase
purchase_id = #{purchaseId},
vendor_id = #{vendorId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
batch = #{batch},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice},
number = #{number},
status = #{status},
user_renew_id = #{userRenewId},
renew_time = #{renewTime},
where id = #{id};
mapper.select:
select d.id as d_id, d.purchase_id as d_purchase_id, d.vendor_id as d_vendor_id, d.sku_id as d_sku_id, d.batch as d_batch, d.purchase_price as d_purchase_price, d.number as d_number, d.status as d_status, d.create_user_id as d_create_user_id, d.create_time as d_create_time, d.user_renew_id as d_user_renew_id, d.renew_time as d_renew_time,
p.id as p_id, p.purchase_desc as p_purchase_desc, p.purchase_number as p_purchase_number, p.examine_user_id as p_examine_user_id, p.examine_time as p_examine_time, p.examine_opinion as p_examine_opinion, p.examine_status as p_examine_status, p.sum_price as p_sum_price, p.create_user_id as p_create_user_id, p.create_time as p_create_time, p.user_renew_id as p_user_renew_id, p.renew_time as p_renew_time,
v.id as v_id, v.vendor_name as v_vendor_name, v.sku_id as v_sku_id, v.vendor_address as v_vendor_address, v.desc as v_desc, v.principal as v_principal, v.tel as v_tel, v.create_user_id as v_create_user_id, v.create_time as v_create_time, v.user_renew_id as v_user_renew_id, v.renew_time as v_renew_time, v.purchase_time as v_purchase_time,
g.id as g_id, g.spu_id as g_spu_id, g.sku_name as g_sku_name, g.sku_desc as g_sku_desc, g.color_id as g_color_id, g.price_id as g_price_id, g.Stock_id as g_Stock_id, g.sales_volume as g_sales_volume, g.company_id as g_company_id, g.manufacturer as g_manufacturer, g.Supplier_id as g_Supplier_id, g.create_user_id as g_create_user_id, g.create_time as g_create_time, g.user_renewId as g_user_renewId, g.renew_time as g_renew_time, g.logic_status as g_logic_status,
c.id as c_id, c.role_id as c_role_id, c.username as c_username, c.password as c_password, c.address as c_address, c.phone as c_phone, c.create_user_id as c_create_user_id, c.create_time as c_create_time, c.user_renew_id as c_user_renew_id, c.renew_time as c_renew_time,
u.id as u_id, u.role_id as u_role_id, u.username as u_username, u.password as u_password, u.address as u_address, u.phone as u_phone, u.create_user_id as u_create_user_id, u.create_time as u_create_time, u.user_renew_id as u_user_renew_id, u.renew_time as u_renew_time from detailed_purchase d left join purchase p on d.purchase_id = p.id left join vendor v on d.vendor_id = v.id left join goodsku g on d.sku_id = g.id left join user c on c.id = d.create_user_id left join user u on u.id = d.user_renew_id where d.id = #{id};

select d.id as d_id, d.purchase_id as d_purchase_id, d.vendor_id as d_vendor_id, d.sku_id as d_sku_id, d.batch as d_batch, d.purchase_price as d_purchase_price, d.number as d_number, d.status as d_status, d.create_user_id as d_create_user_id, d.create_time as d_create_time, d.user_renew_id as d_user_renew_id, d.renew_time as d_renew_time,
p.id as p_id, p.purchase_desc as p_purchase_desc, p.purchase_number as p_purchase_number, p.examine_user_id as p_examine_user_id, p.examine_time as p_examine_time, p.examine_opinion as p_examine_opinion, p.examine_status as p_examine_status, p.sum_price as p_sum_price, p.create_user_id as p_create_user_id, p.create_time as p_create_time, p.user_renew_id as p_user_renew_id, p.renew_time as p_renew_time,
v.id as v_id, v.vendor_name as v_vendor_name, v.sku_id as v_sku_id, v.vendor_address as v_vendor_address, v.desc as v_desc, v.principal as v_principal, v.tel as v_tel, v.create_user_id as v_create_user_id, v.create_time as v_create_time, v.user_renew_id as v_user_renew_id, v.renew_time as v_renew_time, v.purchase_time as v_purchase_time,
g.id as g_id, g.spu_id as g_spu_id, g.sku_name as g_sku_name, g.sku_desc as g_sku_desc, g.color_id as g_color_id, g.price_id as g_price_id, g.Stock_id as g_Stock_id, g.sales_volume as g_sales_volume, g.company_id as g_company_id, g.manufacturer as g_manufacturer, g.Supplier_id as g_Supplier_id, g.create_user_id as g_create_user_id, g.create_time as g_create_time, g.user_renewId as g_user_renewId, g.renew_time as g_renew_time, g.logic_status as g_logic_status,
co.id as co_id, co.color_name as co_color_name, co.create_user_id as co_create_user_id, co.create_time as co_create_time, co.user_renew_id as co_user_renew_id, co.renew_time as co_renew_time,
c.id as c_id, c.role_id as c_role_id, c.username as c_username, c.password as c_password, c.address as c_address, c.phone as c_phone, c.create_user_id as c_create_user_id, c.create_time as c_create_time, c.user_renew_id as c_user_renew_id, c.renew_time as c_renew_time,
u.id as u_id, u.role_id as u_role_id, u.username as u_username, u.password as u_password, u.address as u_address, u.phone as u_phone, u.create_user_id as u_create_user_id, u.create_time as u_create_time, u.user_renew_id as u_user_renew_id, u.renew_time as u_renew_time from detailed_purchase d left join purchase p on d.purchase_id = p.id left join vendor v on d.vendor_id = v.id left join goodsku g on d.sku_id = g.id left join color co on g.color_id = co.id left join user c on c.id = d.create_user_id left join user u on u.id = d.user_renew_id where d.purchase_id = #{purchaseId} and d.logic_del = 0;
